5735.name: Just for Laughs
5735.description: Silent prank show filmed in Montreal, Canada, where unsuspecting people are hilariously caught in comedic situations, reminiscent of Candid Camera.

6208.name: Law & Crime
6208.description: Discover the Law & Crime Channel, your go-to source for live trial coverage, expert legal analysis, and gripping true crime stories 24/7. Tune in for the latest!

5430.name: RightNow TV
5430.description: Explosions. Chase scenes. Zero downtime. RightNow TV is wall-to-wall action with hard-hitting shows that don’t let up. If it moves fast, hits hard, or blows up—it’s here.

5746.name: ENCORE+
5746.description: Encore+ TV Channel offers a diverse selection of classic and contemporary films, series, and documentaries, celebrating timeless entertainment for all ages. Tune in now on STIRR!

6439.name: Wild TV
6439.description: From big game hunts to backcountry fishing and shooting sports, Wild TV brings the adrenaline of the outdoors straight to your screen. Your nonstop source for rugged adventures, expert tips, and wild pursuits.

6435.name: PursuitUP
6435.description: PursuitUP is a television network dedicated to the hunting and fishing lifestyle that millions of people enjoy. With content from over 100 producers. At Pursuit we’ve got something for everyone with a passion for the outdoors. Pursuit UP, We Deliver the Outdoors.

6595.name: Western Bound
6595.description: Western Bound US: Your 24/7 destination for classic and modern Western storytelling. Immerse yourself in frontier adventures, iconic series, and cowboy legends across multiple streaming platforms. Free, authentic, and always entertaining.

6408.name: Dark Matters TV
6408.description: Dark Matter TV is your go-to channel for horror, sci-fi, action, and true crime. Packed with cult classics, hidden gems, and intense thrillers, it’s genre entertainment the way fans actually want it—bold, curated, and endlessly bingeable.

6589.name: Teenvee
6589.description:
TeenVee is two incredible shows! Teen-Z tells hilarious stories about students
as they make friends and get into plenty of awkward situations. Avocado Couple combines animation
and humour to highlight the many aspects of relationships.

5309.name: Electric Now
5309.description: Catch your favorite TV shows, cult classic movies, and pop culture hits all day, every day with Electric Now. From iconic series to unforgettable films, it’s your go-to channel for nonstop entertainment.

6921.name: USA Today
6921.description: Breaking news, live events, national stories, politics, sports, entertainment & feel-good features—stream it all 24/7 on the USA TODAY Fast Channel. Fast, free, and always on. Trusted reporting, zero fluff. Only on STIRR.

6585.name: Imagine PlayWorld
6585.description:
Welcome to this extraordinary world, where arts, crafts, and fantasy meet in a
whirlwind of entertainment! This is the ultimate channel for parents, guardians, and kids alike, where
imagination and creativity knows no bounds.

6587.name: Slick Slime Sam
6587.description:
Meet Slick Slime Sam! The most entertaining slime in history and his "pet
human" Sue help with your latest DIY or life hack project, cook incredible food and work together to
find common ground. Sam is pink, hilarious and ready to get to work!

5748.name: KIDDO+
5748.description: KIDDO+ TV Channel offers 24/7 streaming of engaging movies and series for kids, featuring animation and family-friendly content tailored for young audiences. Tune in today!

5288.name: OAN plus
5288.description: One America News Network "OAN" delivers a credible source for national and international news 24/7, including breaking political, business and entertainment headlines.

5720.name: VOA (Voice of America)
5720.description: Voice of America TV delivers trusted news and information in 48 languages, providing a unique perspective on global events and American culture to over 354 million viewers worldwide.

6701.name: Al Jazeera
6701.description: Al Jazeera English, the global news channel from Al Jazeera Media Network, is now available as a free, ad-supported streaming channel in the United States through platforms like SLING Free. This service provides American audiences with 24/7 access to Al Jazeera’s award-winning international news.

6759.name: DeFiance Media
6759.description: Where tech meets culture. DeFiance Media dishes up nonstop takes on Web3, blockchain, AI, and the wild world of decentralized everything—with news, shows, and smart humans (and bots) at the mic.

6414.name: NTD
6414.description: NTD is a New York-based, global television network to bring the world uncensored and truthful information. NTD strives to remain free from external influence—whether from political, financial, or special interests. We have rapidly emerged as a leading independent news broadcaster.

6625.name: Nightmare Network
6625.description: From jump scares to spine-tingling classics, Nightmare Network is your all-horror, all-the-time destination. Whether you crave slashers, thrillers, or supernatural chills—this channel keeps the fear flowing 24/7.

6430.name: GenB TV
6430.description: Generation Black TV is a streaming platform that celebrates and amplifies Black excellence by showcasing content created by and for the global Black and African American communities.

6441.name: My Money
6441.description: “My Money” FAST channel offers free, ad-supported financial content, including market updates, investment tips, and personal finance advice. Available on smart TVs and streaming devices, it provides 24/7 programming with targeted advertising, catering to viewers seeking accessible financial info.

771.name: FITE 24 7
771.description: Experience FITE TV: Your ultimate combat sports destination. Stream live boxing, MMA, wrestling, and more. Enjoy exclusive events, PPV matches, and on-demand content 24/7!

5716.name: EuroNews
5716.description: Euronews FAST channel offers 24/7 international news with a European perspective. It provides global coverage in 17 languages, reaching 400 million households across 160 countries. Known for unbiased, fact-based reporting, Euronews delivers trusted content on politics, business, and culture via sate

6424.name: SPEED SPORT 1
6424.description: SPEED SPORT 1 – THE MOTORSPORTS NETWORK  - The first network dedicated to live motorsports. Designed for the world’s most passionate motorsports fans now on STIRR

6409.name: Teton Gravity  Research
6409.description: TGR began producing premier ski, snowboard, and surf films. Eighteen years and thirty-two films later, the company continues to evolve. Transcending film, TGR has emerged as a media force in action sports culture.

5274.name: SWERVE Combat
5274.description: Swerve TV is your ultimate destination for live combat sports, featuring thrilling MMA, boxing, and Muay Thai events, plus exclusive documentaries and athlete interviews!

5721.name: Automotions
5721.description: Automotions offers new car model reviews, including trailers, interior and exterior shots, and driving scenes. The channel also includes interviews with popular figures in the automotive industry.

6425.name: TRACE Sportstar
6425.description: TRACE Sport Stars is the first channel exclusively dedicated to sports celebrities. TRACE Sport Stars gives unique behind-the-scenes access to athletes, offering an intimate and in-depth understanding of their lives.

6411.name: Fuel TV
6411.description: Fuel TV is a sports-orientated streaming action sports channel owned by FUEL TV Global, S.A. The channel is focused on the culture of extreme sports such as skateboarding, snowboarding, wakeboarding, motocross, surfing, BMX, FMX and is available in many countries.

1549.name: Extreme+
1549.description: The original extreme sports channel, bringing global audiences the best mix of extreme sports from around the world 24.

1072.name: Channel Fight
1072.description: Channel Fight TV is your ultimate destination for live combat sports, featuring thrilling boxing, MMA events, and exclusive interviews with fighters and experts. Tune in now!

5887.name: Surfing Plus
5887.description: Surfing Plus TV Channel is your ultimate destination for non-stop surfing action, featuring thrilling competitions, documentaries, and lifestyle shows celebrating the surf culture!

5304.name: Poker Night in America
5304.description: Poker Night in America is an innovative platform for poker entertainment, bridging live gameplay with television and digital media.

5730.name: Nitro TV
5730.description: Nitro TV Channel is your go-to destination for high-octane entertainment, featuring thrilling motorsports, monster truck races, and adrenaline-fueled shows for the whole family!

5306.name: World Poker Tour
5306.description: Catch every bluff, bet, and big win on the World Poker Tour TV Channel. With high-stakes games, global tournaments, and expert insights from poker pros, it’s your all-in destination for nonstop poker action.

5300.name: The Grappling Network
5300.description: The Grappling Network connects martial arts enthusiasts through training resources, expert insights, and a vibrant community. Join us to enhance your skills and network!

5294.name: Cricket Gold
5294.description: Cricket Gold TV is a dedicated platform for cricket fans, celebrating the sport’s history while providing access to classic matches and informative programming.

5740.name: Ace TV
5740.description: From intense rallies to post-match breakdowns, ACE Tennis TV delivers live matches, player interviews, and expert takes from courts around the world. Game, set, match—it’s all here, all the time.

5726.name: Nautical Channel
5726.description: Nautical TV Channel is your gateway to the sea, featuring captivating documentaries, thrilling maritime adventures, and expert insights into sailing, fishing, and ocean life!

5747.name: Hunt Fish TV
5747.description: Ready for adventure? Hunt Fish TV delivers nonstop hunting action, expert fishing tips, and outdoor thrills all day, every day. Dive into the wild world of hunters, anglers, and untamed places—only on Hunt Fish TV.

5293.name: Adventure Sports TV
5293.description: Adventure Sports TV inspirew viewers with thrilling content that celebrates the spirit of adventure and the excitement of extreme sports.

5295.name: Equus TV
5295.description: EQUUS TV offers free, 24/7 equestrian lifestyle content on SmartTV platforms. Features include live event coverage, training tips, horse care, documentaries, and original series. Global programming spans various disciplines, from show jumping to rodeo, catering to horse enthusiasts worldwide

6412.name: Crafty Panda
6412.description: DIY channel focusing on comedic situations based on daily routines: school hacks, makeup tutorials, beauty tips, fashion and home decor ideas and much more!Unknown description

5407.name: Drone TV
5407.description: Epic aerial views from around the world - Drone TV streams stunning drone footage 24/7. Free to watch, wherever you are.

6581.name: 5-Minute Crafts
6581.description:
5-Minute Crafts is the world’s most popular DIY channel, known for its positive,
fun, and quirky crafts. The channel shows helpful ideas for projects that empower viewers to solve
everyday problems with creative and simple solutions. (TheSoul)

5305.name: Sports First
5305.description: From jaw-dropping stunts to unforgettable athlete stories, Sports First brings you the best in action, adrenaline, and all things sports from sources like Red Bull Media House. Whether you’re a hardcore fan or just love a great highlight reel, this channel brings the heat.

5395.name: ONTV4U
5395.description: Need to know what’s on? OnTV4U is your go-to guide for what’s airing and streaming across the country. From prime-time hits to hidden gems, stay in the know and never miss your next favorite show or movie.

6413.name: CraftsyTV
6413.description: CraftsyTV is your online resource for all creative makers, where you can find everything you need – from basic instruction to advanced techniques.

5428.name: JLTV
5428.description: Jewish Life TV offers engaging programming that celebrates Jewish culture, traditions, and values, featuring documentaries, lifestyle shows, and community stories for all ages.

5455.name: Family Time
5455.description: Family Time TV focuses on the comedy genre and features a variety of family-friendly content, including movies, TV classics, and original programming that emphasizes wholesome storytelling and modern family values.

5289.name: AWE plus
5289.description: Explore the world in style with AWE Plus—where breathtaking travel, epic adventures, and luxury living meet. From dream destinations to culinary delights, AWE Plus inspires every step of the journey.

5299.name: Freebie TV
5299.description: Freebie TV is a free streaming service offering live TV and on-demand movies, featuring a variety of channels and content without subscription fees. Enjoy endless entertainment!

5302.name: Humor Mill TV
5302.description: Humor Mill TV primarily focuses on the urban comedy genre. It features a variety of content related to urban entertainment, including news, interviews, and showcases of comedians, making it a hub for fans of comedic performances and urban culture.

5739.name: Docu Vision
5739.description: Docu Vision TV Channel offers captivating documentaries and insightful programming that explore diverse topics, cultures, and stories from around the world. Tune in for knowledge!

5436.name: Popstar! TV
5436.description: Popstar TV aims delivers engaging entertainment that resonates active adults aged 25-49, providing a mix of drama, comedy, and lifestyle content.

5745.name: Cowboy Movie Channel
5745.description: Ride into nonstop adventure with Cowboy Movie Channel—streaming classic Westerns, modern hits, and legendary tales from the frontier. If you love six-shooters, dusty trails, and iconic heroes, this is your kind of channel.

5441.name: TBN
5441.description: Experience uplifting programming with TBN, the world’s largest Christian network, offering faith-based shows, music, and inspiring content 24/7. Tune in today!

5308.name: Zoomer TV
5308.description: Zoomer TV offers a diverse lineup of programming for the 50+ audience, featuring lifestyle shows, classic films, and engaging content that celebrates life and community.

5298.name: Feva TV
5298.description: FEVA TV Channel, the First Entertainment Voice of Africa, offers a vibrant mix of music, movies, news, and sports, celebrating the African and Caribbean communities globally.

5273.name: CrimeFlix
5273.description: CrimeFlix brings you nonstop crime—gripping dramas, twisted mysteries, and real-life cases that keep you guessing. If it’s criminal, it’s on. Tune in and get hooked.

6583.name: Bright Side
6583.description:
With engaging shows that showcase travel and exploration, self-improvement,
gadgets, riddles and pop-culture, Bright Side’s brain-tickling content is as diverse and robust as its
global audience.

5453.name: Gotraveler
5453.description: GoTraveler Channel is your ultimate travel companion, offering over 500 hours of free programming that explores cultures, cuisines, and adventures from around the globe.

5734.name: 4K Travel TV
5734.description: Explore 4K Travel TV Channel for breathtaking journeys to stunning destinations worldwide. Experience vibrant cultures, landscapes, and adventures in stunning 4K resolution!

3353.name: Omstars
3353.description: Omstars TV is your home for health and wellness. Watch videos on yoga, meditation, philosophy, cooking, and more.

6426.name: TRACE Urban
6426.description: TRACE Urban is the #1 Hip-hop, R&B and Rhythmic Top 40 music channel. It showcases the best videos from these three music genres as well as interviews, shows and documentaries related to urban artists and culture.

6591.name: La La Life
6591.description:
The latest trends, comedy, and sounds - every moment has its music! A fun
and entertaining show for Teens about everything around us.

6427.name: TRACE UK
6427.description: Trace UK -brings viewers the very best of national and international artists, playing the hottest Hip-Hop, Rap, Afrobeats, R&B, Grime, Drill and the biggest music videos taking over the UK scene.

6429.name: TRACE Brazuca
6429.description: TRACE Brazuca TV Channel, the ultimate destination for the best urban music videos and content from Brazil. As the number one music channel dedicated to Brazilian music, TRACE Brazuca offers a unique insight into the vibrant world of Brazilian music and culture.

5297.name: Feva Music
5297.description: Fava Music Channel is your ultimate destination for the best in music entertainment, featuring a vibrant mix of genres, artist showcases, and exclusive performances that inspire!

5408.name: RVTV
5408.description: RVTV Channel is your go-to destination for all things RV! Enjoy informative reviews, travel tips, and breathtaking documentaries celebrating the RV lifestyle. Tune in now!

6467.name: News 9 - KWTV - (Oklahoma City, OK)
6467.description: Get the latest Oklahoma City headlines, live weather radar, and community stories with News 9 KWTV. From breaking news to local sports, it’s everything you need—right when you need it.

6465.name: News On 6 - KOTV - (Tulsa, OK)
6465.description: Catch Tulsa’s breaking stories, storm alerts, and community updates with News On 6. From local sports to trusted reporting, stay in the loop with everything happening across Northeast Oklahoma.

5454.name: Hipstr
5454.description: Hipstr TV features a diverse range of content, including groundbreaking documentaries, scripted series, and exclusive originals that explore various cultural perspectives, alternative lifestyles, and subcultures.

5290.name: The Big Dish Channel
5290.description: The Big Dish: Qurate Retail Group’s first FAST channel on Roku. Launched April 2024, offering 24/7 culinary content. Features famous chefs, kitchen gadgets, and food trends. Combines QVC and HSN’s video commerce expertise with focused cooking shows.

6477.name: News10NBC - WHEC - (Rochester, NY)
6477.description: WHEC News 10 keeps Rochester connected with real-time news, weather, traffic, and local sports. Stay in the know with trusted updates and stories that matter most across Western New York—all in one place.

6473.name: KOB 4 - (Albuquerque, NM)
6473.description: KOB 4 brings you the latest news, weather, traffic, and sports from Albuquerque, Santa Fe, and across New Mexico. Stay connected to your state with trusted local coverage that keeps you informed and up to date.

6479.name: WDIO ABC News - (Duluth, MN)
6479.description: WDIO ABC News brings you the latest news, weather, and sports from Duluth, Northern Minnesota, the Iron Range, Northwest Wisconsin, and Michigan’s Upper Peninsula—covering your community from every angle.

6481.name: ABC 6 NEWS - KAAL - (Minnesota & Iowa)
6481.description: KAAL ABC 6 News brings you real-time local news, weather, and sports from Southeast Minnesota and Northeast Iowa. Stay ahead of the headlines and connected to what matters in your community.

6475.name: NewsChannel 13 - WNYT - (Albany, NY)
6475.description: Get trusted local news, weather, and stories from Albany and across the Capital Region with WNYT NewsChannel 13—your go-to source for everything happening in Upstate New York. Coverage you can count on.

6485.name: KOMO NEWS 4 - ABC - (Seattle, WA*)
6485.description: Stay informed with KOMO News 4—Seattle’s trusted source for breaking news, weather, traffic, and in-depth investigations. Award-winning local coverage that keeps you connected to what matters most in Western Washington.

6491.name: CBS 2 News - KUTV - (Salt Lake City, UT*)
6491.description: Get the latest Salt Lake City news, weather, and community updates from KUTV CBS 2 News. Stream live and on-demand coverage totally free on STIRR—no sign-ups, just solid local reporting whenever you want it.

6489.name: Baltimore News: Breaking, Weather & Sports | FOX 45
6489.description: WBFF FOX45 is Baltimore’s trusted source for breaking news, investigative reporting, and comprehensive weather coverage. Serving central Maryland, the station delivers accurate, timely information on local events, sports, and community events while providing in-depth analysis on stories that matter.

6469.name: ABC 5 - KSTP - (Minneapolis-St. Paul, MN)
6469.description: KSTP ABC 5 brings you trusted news, weather, traffic, and sports from Minneapolis–St. Paul and across Minnesota. Stay informed with Eyewitness News covering the stories that matter most to the Twin Cities and beyond.

6487.name: KATU 2 ABC - (Portland, OR*)
6487.description: Catch Portland’s KATU 2 ABC live on STIRR—local news, weather, traffic, and more, totally FREE. No cable. No hassle. Just real stories, whenever you want.

6493.name: News 4 - WOAI - (San Antonio, TX*)
6493.description: WOAI delivers the latest news, weather, and sports across San Antonio and South Texas. From breaking updates to community stories, watch it all live and free on STIRR—no sign-ups, just real local coverage when it matters most.

6497.name: CBS Austin - KEYE - (Austin, TX*)
6497.description: Watch CBS Austin KEYE for breaking news, weather updates, and live coverage you can trust. We’re your local source for what’s happening in Austin and Central Texas—stream for free anytime, anywhere. Get the latest info on traffic, sports, and community events that matter to you.

6499.name: Local 12 - WKRC - (Cincinnati, OH*)
6499.description: WKRC Local 12 is Cincinnati’s trusted source for breaking news, accurate weather forecasts, and comprehensive coverage that matters to you. From downtown to the suburbs, Northern Kentucky to the entire Tri-State region, our dedicated team delivers the stories that impact your daily life.

6501.name: ABC 13 News - WLOS - (Asheville, NC*)
6501.description: Stay informed with WLOS ABC 13 News, your trusted source for breaking news, weather forecasts, and community stories in Asheville and across Western North Carolina. Watch live broadcasts, access local updates, and connect with the issues that matter most to the mountains.

6503.name: CBS 12 - WPEC - (West Palm Beach, FL*)
6503.description: CBS 12 WPEC delivers breaking news, accurate weather forecasts, and in-depth local coverage for West Palm Beach and South FL. Count on our trusted team for up-to-the-minute updates on stories that matter to your community, plus traffic, sports, and investigative reporting that makes a difference.

6507.name: News Channel 3 CBS - WWMT - (Grand Rapids, MI*)
6507.description: News Channel 3 CBS - WWMT - (Grand Rapids, MI*)

6495.name: ABC 6 - WSYX - (Columbus, OH*)
6495.description: ABC 6 WSYX brings you Columbus’ most trusted news, weather, and local coverage. Your go-to source for what’s happening in Central Ohio, with breaking updates, community stories, and investigative reporting that matters.

6509.name: CBS 21 News - WHP - (Harrisburg, PA*)
6509.description: Get the latest news, weather, and sports from Harrisburg and Central PA with WHP. From morning headlines to evening updates.

6513.name: 10 NBC WJAR - (Providence, RI*)
6513.description: WJAR NBC 10 delivers the latest local news, weather, traffic, and community stories from Providence and beyond. Stay connected to what matters most in Rhode Island and Southeastern Massachusetts.

6519.name: FOX 11 - WLUK - (Green Bay, WI*)
6519.description: WLUK Fox 11 delivers Northeast Wisconsin’s most trusted local news, up-to-the-minute weather forecasts, and comprehensive Packers coverage. Serving Green Bay and the Fox Valley region since 1954, count on Fox 11 for breaking news, community stories, and the information that matters most to you.

6515.name: Fox 26 - KMPH - (Fresno, CA*)
6515.description: Fox 26 KMPH is the Central Valley’s most trusted news, weather, and local coverage. Your go-to source for what matters in Fresno and beyond, with breaking updates, community stories, and entertainment you won’t find elsewhere. Watch live or on-demand—totally free and super convenient on any device.

6529.name: 6 NEWS NBC - WJAC - (Johnstown, PA*)
6529.description: Stay connected with WJAC for live local news, weather, and sports from Johnstown and Central PA. From breaking stories to community updates—you’ll get it all, straight from the source.

6531.name: FOX 9 - WTOV - (Steubenville, OH*)
6531.description: Stream FOX 9 - WTOV. Get Steubenville’s latest news, weather, and sports—live or on-demand. No cable, no fees, just local stories that matter.

6535.name: KSL-TV -5 - (Salt Lake City, UT)
6535.description: Get Salt Lake City’s top stories, weather alerts, and local coverage from KSL-TV 5. Your go-to station for news that matters across Utah.
